pages.text: The Ritual of Floral Supremacy is a powerful ritual that bridges Blood Magic and Botania, supercharging nearby mana-generating flowers and accelerating mana distribution. This ritual simulates the effect of Botania's enchanted soil (Overgrowth Seed) while also speeding up mana spreaders for maximum efficiency.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: Every second, the ritual scans for Botania mana-generating flowers and mana spreaders within its radius:$(br2)$(blood)Flower Enhancement:$()$(br)Each flower is supercharged, doubling its tick rate as if it were placed on enchanted soil. This effectively doubles mana production.$(br2)$(animus)Spreader Acceleration:$()$(br)Each mana spreader receives 2x tick acceleration for 2 seconds, rapidly transferring mana to pools and devices.

pages.title: LP Consumption
pages.text: The ritual consumes LP based on the number of flowers being enhanced:$(br2)$(blood)LP Cost:$() 50 LP per flower per second (configurable)$(br2)If you have 10 Endoflames in range, the ritual will consume 500 LP per second to supercharge them all. No flowers in range = no LP consumed.$(br2)The ritual only operates when there are flowers to enhance and you have sufficient LP.

pages.title: Synergy
pages.text: This ritual works exceptionally well with:$(br)• $(animus)Diabolical Fungi$(); Generate mana from demon will$(br)• $(animus)Endoflames$(); Increased fuel consumption rate$(br)• $(animus)Rosa Arcana$(); More frequent XP draining$(br)• $(animus)Any generating flower$(); Doubled production$(br2)The mana spreader acceleration ensures your increased mana production doesn't bottleneck at the transfer stage.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: The Ritual of Floral Supremacy can be configured via the server config:$(br)- Radius: Effect radius in blocks (default: 8, range: 1-32)$(br)- LP Per Flower: LP cost per flower supercharged (default: 50, range: 1-1000)$(br2)$(blood)Activation Cost:$() 10000 LP$(br)$(animus)Refresh Time:$() 1 second (20 ticks)$(br2)$(will)Requires:$() Both Blood Magic and Botania must be installed

pages.title: Ritual Structure
pages.text: The Ritual of Floral Supremacy uses a nature-themed pattern with 8 Earth runes (representing natural growth), 4 Water runes (representing mana flow), and 4 Air runes (representing acceleration). The pattern creates a harmonious blend of elemental energies.

pages.title: Usage Tips
pages.text: This ritual is excellent for:$(br)• Burst mana generation when you need large amounts quickly$(br)• Overclocking existing flower setups$(br)• Accelerating mana transfer to distant pools$(br)• Hybrid Blood Magic + Botania automation$(br2)At default settings with 10 flowers, this ritual costs 500 LP/second to maintain. The doubled production often makes the LP cost worthwhile for time-sensitive projects.$(br2)Pro tip: Pair with the Diabolical Fungi to convert demon will into mana at double speed!
